name: ai-agent-marketplace
description: AI Agent Marketplace for content monetization - Coinbase Hackathon Project

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../extension && npm install

scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
